section_hero.title: Universal messaging, with you at its core.
section_hero.description: Satellite gives you peace of mind with end-to-end encryption without sacrificing quality.

description.one: Satellite is to be secure down to its core. We utilize leading decentralization and encryption technology to provide a platform to build extensible apps you can tailor with custom mods and extensions to make them your own. All of this, coupled with top to bottom encryption, makes your journey in the digital world a bit less scary and frustrating.
description.two: All of that, of course, comes with no compromises. Satellite ships with huge file sharing and stunning quality voice and video we know you'll love.

multi_platform.title: Multi-Platform
multi_platform.description: Satellite is about more than just a universal chat app. Satellite is built to be offline-first so your conversation is never left unheard. From mobile, desktop, your favorite games, and beyond, Satellite lets you take ownership of your digital identity, so all your comms move with you. Get ready for Early Access coming soon.

chat.title: Multi Platform chat
chat.description: Chat anywhere with our cross platform app.

sharing.title: Easy File sharing
sharing.description: Share up to 4GB files instantly with friends.

serverless.title: Decentralized and Peer-to-peer
serverless.description: Your data goes straight to your friends, nobody tracking in the middle.

description.one: Satellite is nearing early access. If you'd like to be a part of building the future of messaging with us, give Satellite a try and join our journey. Satellite's test environment will be available soon!
description.two: Satellite installs as a PWA which makes it very easy to get started, just navigate to https://core.satellite.im on your phone to get started.

section_team.title: Our Team
section_team.description: Satellite is full of passionate open-source developers as well as our in house team which both work hard to build a different kind of chat platform.
